name: MERLIN
full_name: Parameter-Free Discovery of Arbitrary Length Anomalies in Massive Time Series Archives
paper: MERLIN: Parameter-Free Discovery of Arbitrary Length Anomalies in Massive Time Series Archives. ICDM
description: MERLIN is a Matrix Profile-based algorithm that can efficiently and exactly find discords of all lengths in massive time series archives.
